CustomField.formula: IF( Data_Quality_Score__c =100,"All Contact Details Captured", "Missing: "&IF( LEN( Phone ) = 0, "Phone, ","")&""&IF(LEN( Email) = 0, "Email, ","")&""&IF( LEN( MailingStreet ) = 0, "Complete Address, ","")&""&IF( LEN(Title) = 0, "Job Title, ","")&""&IF( ISPICKVAL( Salutation,""), "Salutation",""))
CustomField.label: Data Quality Description
